summary:
- **Strategic shift**: Flagship terminates lithium brine project (TALP) in Chile due to oversupplied lithium market; reallocates resources to Pantanillo Gold Project.  
- **Gold resource focus**: Pantanillo holds 47.4Mt @ 0.69g/t Au (1.05Moz Au QFE), targeting JORC conversion (currently NI 43-101).  
- **Funding plan**: Equity placement of $3M anticipated in April to validate historical gold resource data.  

*(No material trading or capital-raising timetable details provided.)*
